attributes.action: condemn all supermarkets for banning the CD sleeve of new Manics album from public view.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco, along with some other UK retailers, are banning the CD sleeve of the new Manic Street Preachers album from their shelves on the grounds that its image of a disfigured child is "inappropriate".  This petition believes that such a ban not only suppresses artistic freedom, but fundamentally implies that having a disfigurement is something to be ashamed of.
